notes:
The test vector is compiled with the parameters LMOTS_SHAKE_N32_W8 and LMS_SHAKE_N32_H5.

Verified. Section A.3 heading: SHA-256/256 -> SHAKE256/256.
Test vector uses LMOTS_SHAKE_N32_W8 (0x0c) and
LMS_SHAKE_M32_H5 (0x0f). All six figure captions within
the section correctly say SHAKE256/256.
